subject: Skiing
Tribeca Film Festival (NYC)
Motion Pictures
Cameras
lead_paragraph: A documentary called “Steep,” which premiered at the Tribeca Film Festival, uses the technology that allows cameras to swoop over quarterbacks in N.F.L. telecasts.
snippet: A documentary called “Steep,” which premiered at the Tribeca Film Festival, uses the technology that allows cameras to swoop over quarterbacks in N.F.L. telecasts.
